report.title: Talkative and Alert
report.author: sia
report.bodytext: I took 1mg of lorazepam and 40mg of 4-Fluoroamphetamine. The effects of the 4-FA were a little stronger than caffeine is just before it gets jittery. /n /n I was talkative and alert, but without any jittering or jaw grinding. The effects passed after about 4 hours and no ill after effects were noted. I usually go for 80-120mg for full effects of this substance. /n /n I took a drug test the next day for the military and 4-FA did not show up, but the lorazepam did.
